name: Audit & Assurance
description: Our expert professionals provide a range of audit services based on a strong understanding of accounting principles which is related with the Bangladesh Standards on Auditing and International Standards on Auditing.

name: Tax & legal advice
description: I  provide  services  of  Tax  &  Legal  advices  which  are designed  to help  our  clients  to  apply  the  most  effective  business  strategies

name: Advisory Services
description: Formation, incorporation, liquidation and winding up of companies

name: Outsourcing-Maintaining Personal Account
description: I offers business outsourcing solution that delivers a high level of confidence and professional results by focusing your business.

name: internal and management audit
description: A management audit is an analysis and assessment of the competencies and capabilities of a company's management to carry out corporate objectives.

name: Business planning and project feasibility studies
description: Essentially, feasibility studies are research projects, whereas business plans are projections for the future
